segments.text: I'm watching this kitchen from a side angle, taking it all in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's at the sink, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's running from the faucet, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over onto the floor, forming a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on a step stool, reaching into the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, and he's grabbing some out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks a bit unsteady under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, her arm extended toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back from the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, there's a tidy garden with plants and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup feels so typically domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the hidden risks really catch me off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an ordinary moment with unexpected twists.
segments.speaker: PAR
